root.text: â€œThe event is about revealing the bright and dark fields of all the branches of basic engineering.It will test youe basic soft skills and knowledge on the basis of Jumble words and lecturette . The event will be conducted on two phases.

text: Results Declared by Judges will be the final
1st round result will be declared on text message on your registered mobile number
Participants should not argue with judges

root.text: WORDSMINIA-is a Preliminary phase consists of JUMBLE WORDS basic engineering terms at a duration of 15 mins on 10:00AM-12:00PM based on the preliminary result  participants will be selected for next phase.

BRIGHTFIELD is a final phase of the event.it consists of lecturette .Topic for the lecturette  will be given on onspot. Participants will give their best presentation of the topic with given time based on the performance of the participant final results will be declared by judges.timing of the round 2 is 02:00PM-3:00PM.
